rules_text:
Creatures without reach or flying can't block this turn.
[i]Addendum[/i] – If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.
rules_text2:
Lonesome Quarry enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Lonesome Quarry: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
